title: Wow! BEACHFRONT Sunny Isles La Perla 2 Bed 2 Bath Condo For RENT #330
posting_body: ['Wow!', 'BEACHFRONT Sunny Isles La Perla 2 Bed 2 Bath Condo for RENT!', 'Lovely Luxury Living!', '#3309...!!!', '...', 'Seasonal rental.', 'Beautiful 2 bedrooms/ 2 bathrooms direct ocean view apartment at the luxurious La Perla in Sunny Isles Beach.', 'Situated on the 33rd floor of the building, this totally furnished property offers incredible views of the ocean, beach, bay, and the city of Miami in the distance.', 'SEASONAL rent, minimum 30 days and a maximum of 180 days with a $1,500 security deposit.', 'If rent is less than 90 days, the full rent amount should be paid in advance.', 'Max occupancy 4 people.', 'Lodging Taxes (13%) not included.', 'Already rented from December 1, 2021 to March 30, 2022....!!!!,,!', '✓ 2 Bedrooms', '✓ 2 Baths', '✓ 1266 Square Feet', 'Call Jason Velasquez', 'show contact info', 'for showings or questions', 'OR email me !', "If this property doesn't meet your needs, I have something perfect for you.", 'Call me now!', 'Broker/Agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions of features of this property provided by the seller/landlord or obtained from Public Records or other sources.', 'Buyer/Renters are advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.', 'Presented by: Jason Velasquez Florida Licensed Salesperson Lic #:SL3428848']
